content: garter squish by stephen west this super simple garter stitch blanket has an i-cord edge and is worked with two strands of worsted weight yarn held double i used several skeins of yarn from my stash that resulted in a colorful squishy blanket it s a great project for mindless knitting and with us 15 / 10mm needles it eats delicious yarn in no time at all leaving lots of empty space in your yarn box or cabinet or room to fill with new wooly acquisitions © 2012 stephen west all rights reserved pattern for personal use only questions support@westknits com 1 photography by westknits
